description: Track and analyze emerging competitors in the code analysis and semantic search space (code-graph-rag, SeaGOAT, Greptile, Buildt). Monitor their features, differentiation points, and CodeRef's competitive advantages.

competitors.name: code-graph-rag
competitors.coderef_advantage: More mature, 18 CLI commands, MCP integration, quality analysis

competitors.name: SeaGOAT
competitors.coderef_advantage: More features beyond search (quality, docs, breaking changes)

competitors.name: Greptile
competitors.type: Semantic code search for legacy codebases
competitors.focus: Plain English search in messy codebases

competitors.name: Buildt
competitors.coderef_advantage: Open source, quality analysis, documentation generation
